message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, you can have 400k
I'll compromise, you get a bigger share, but not that big
You're getting desperate, I'll take the majority
I'll give you the majority, but I'm not going down without a fight
You're getting close to giving up, I'll take the lion's share
I'll give you almost everything, but I'm not going to get wiped out completely
